for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role-- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at consulting firm Hay Group. After Allen Iverson drove and missed from close, Marcus Camby tipped the ball and Linas Kleiza got possession, hitting the shot from the left wing while falling away under pressure. I just looked up at the clock and saw it was two seconds left, shot it up and it went in, Linas Kleiza said. Carmelo Anthony had 30 points and 12 rebounds, Marcus Camby added 19 points, 14 boards and three blocked shots, and Allen Iverson had his streak of four straight 30-point performances end, finishing with 21.
